title: Focus on C19 Vaccine Injury
cleaned_text:
This week, the World Council for Health has focused on the important topic of Covid-19 vaccine injury. Our June 6 General Assembly Meeting welcomed guests Dr. Richard Urso, Dr. Pierre Kory, and James Wells. A recording of the meeting can be found in the WCH Newsroom.

Dr. Richard Urso shared with us his experience treating those who have taken the Covid-19 injection. In the clip below, he addresses the re-emergence of cancer.

Dr. Pierre Kory shared his experience treating those suffering from a wide range of vaccine injuries as well as his current treatment protocol for Covid-19 injection injury.

Director and co-producer James Wells spoke with us about his new documentary, A Letter to My MP, which highlights the stories of people suffering from vaccine injury and what they have had to face as they navigate their new realities. Watch the trailer:

The World Council for Health will be hosting a screening of this important film on our website on Thursday, June 9. James and Dr. Christian Buckland will be available for a Q&A following the film.

If you’re unable to join us live, the screening will be available in the WCH Newsroom. The full documentary is also available on Brand New Tube.

We invite you to listen to It’s Time to Wake Up, a song by WCH Coalition Partner Iris Koh. It’s Time to Wake Up premiered at Wake Up Asia on April 23, 2022.



On Monday, June 13th, we will continue the conversation on this important topic with our guests Aga Wilson (Sweden), Dr. Sherri Greene (USA), and Janine Gallizia (France).

You’re invited to join us in the WCH Newsroom at 6 pm UTC for this live meeting.
